name: Number S39: Utopia Prime
effectText:
3 Level 4 LIGHT monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using "Number 39: Utopia" you control (transfer its materials to this card). If your opponent's LP is at least 3000 higher than yours: You can detach 3 materials from this card and pay LP so that you only have 10 left; destroy as many Special Summoned monsters your opponent controls as possible, and if you do, banish them, then inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each monster banished.
